entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE MORNING, THEN SNOW LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
HIGHS AROUND 20
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT

SNOW
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE EVENING
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 4 TO 8 INCHES
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES
HIGHS AROUND 20
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 7 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS AROUND ZERO

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY

LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
